rows.label: qst103106_msg001
rows.name:
調査ありがとう。
どうやら天候によって内容が変わるようだ
すべての天候の時の壁画を調べてくれ（仮）

rows.label: qst103106_msg002
rows.name:
どうやら天候によって内容が変わるようだ
すべての天候の時の壁画を調べてくれ（仮）

rows.label: qst103106_msg0001
rows.name:
Tell me, did you manage to read
what was written on the murals?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0002
rows.name:
What's that you say? The writing
was different during the day and night?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0003
rows.name:
Hmm...
These clues seem positively pregnant
with meaning - but what, I can't say.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0004
rows.name:
In particular, this use of "daylight stars"
catches my eye...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0005
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Eureka!
I have it!
...Uerghh...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0006
rows.name:
Sorry about that...
I got carried away for a moment.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0007
rows.name:
You see, the ancient Nopon were
voyagers, sailing from place to place.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0008
rows.name:
They read the stars to find
their way. It let them navigate
with extraordinary accuracy.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0009
rows.name:
So, the "daylight stars" here must
represent some kind of path or
guide. Which means...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0010
rows.name:
The mural locations
all had names, didn't they?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0011
rows.name:
"The Shrine of Journeys"...
"The Shrine of Light"...
"The Shrine of Offering"...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0012
rows.name:
"Offer Light On The Journey"...
Why, this is a key to the reading order!

rows.label: qst103106_msg0013
rows.name:
In which case... That means the
full nighttime message would be...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0014
rows.name:
"Three Daylight Stars
 Offer Light On The Journey
 To Hero's Treasure"

rows.label: qst103106_msg0015
rows.name: And the daytime message is...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0016
rows.name:
"Farlaine Waters
 The Youthful Elder
 In Whose Embrace I Sleep"

rows.label: qst103106_msg0017
rows.name:
So the nighttime message is a key
to the daytime one... And the daytime
message...seems to indicate a location?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0018
rows.name:
I'm very sorry, but I
am no expert on
Invidian geography.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0019
rows.name:
Might I persuade you to
investigate the place indicated?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0020
rows.name:
I have done all in my power to unravel
this riddle. The rest is up to you.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0101
rows.name:
"Farlaine Waters
 The Youthful Elder
 In Whose Embrace I Sleep"

rows.label: qst103106_msg0102
rows.name:
Please seek out the place
indicated by this verse!
